title: Language Learning Design Through Card Games: Applying Observational Learning and Distributed Cognition

context.additional_context: Small-group collaborative learning environment using digital devices. Students recognize language rules through visual arrangements in card games and receive learning motivation through peer observers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the visual arrangement of card games to explain language rules (synonyms, antonyms, sentence structures) with 80% accuracy
Learners can reconstruct learning content by observing peers' problem-solving processes and perform at least three rounds of questioning/feedback
Learners can improve language fluency scores by 15% by participating in game-based activities at least three times weekly via a mobile app
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
